title: Hospitality Practice Competency Enhancement: Blended Programming Based on Industry 4.0/5.0

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners will implement at least three Industry 4.0 simulation codes based on Python

Learners complete two team projects with ≥3 members over six months in a hybrid learning environment using GitHub collaboration tools (issue tracker, Pull Request, project board) and achieve ≥80% code review and issue resolution rates.
Achieving an average of 80% or higher in module-based assessments (quizzes/assignments)
Analyzing at least two case studies of algorithm optimization using real-world industrial data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
